title: Custom Item Set Editor On The Alpha Client
body: The main reason I use the legacy client over the new client is because of the custom item set editor. I know not many people used it and just went with the recommended builds for champions but I would deeply appreciate it if the custom item set editor could be implemented into the new client before/soon after the old client is retired. Thanks.

replies.body: Lol, I didn't even know how to use the custom set
interesting note: updating your item sets in the legacy client does not let you alter them when using your personalised item sets ingame.
